    Info about a tag.

      • getTemplateGeneratedId

        Long getTemplateGeneratedId()
        Returns:

      • getId

        String getId()
        Returns:
        a tag identifier, unique for the template
        Since:
        2.0

      • getChildTags

        List<MustacheTagInfo> getChildTags()
        Returns:
        an immutable list of direct child tags, or an empty list for non-block tags
        Since:
        1.7
